name: Sex Adventures - BDSM Dungeon
description:
About the game
An erotic visual novel about a young couple who hires a Dominatrix. Everything takes a turn when she starts explaining the rules.
Visual Novel Description
Jess and Karl are two attractive people who have been together for more than five years.
At some point, Jess got tired of always being in control and wanted to be the one dominated for once.
Karl, although a very open-minded man, didn't know much about bondage and submission.
Wanting to experience something more exciting as a couple, they finally decided to hire a dominatrix and to set up a meeting.
Everything seemed easy, until the Mistress started explaining all the rules they had to follow and how they were obliged to do as she said.
